main: Each turn spent on the field gives her a stack of {status:StartXichun}.
At 3 stacks of {status:StartXichun}, her S3 gains +1 atk weight and her defense skill triggers a {status:RetreatForCommon} making her retreat to the front of the backups units.

When retreating she consumes all her {status:StartXichun} to apply 1 {status:AttackUp} to an ally for each stack, or 2 {status:AttackUp} for Jia Family identities. Allies are prioritized by deployment order.
Each turn spent in retreat or backup gives her a stack of {status:WaitingXichun}
On the turn she substitutes or returns to the field, she uses her S1-2 at combat start, consuming all {status:WaitingXichun} to gain Atk Weight and Coin Power.
other: Each stack of {status:StartXichun} increases the damage on her S3.
Having {identity:10114} on the field increases her {status:Breath} generation, gives her {status:Enhancement} every turn, and triggers her S3 whenever he triggers his S3-2.

1081201.desc:
When killing the target with this unit's Attack Skills, gain [Breath] equal to [Burst] on target (3 per 1 enemy; once per turn)
- If this unit gained 3 [Breath] with the above effect, gain [Breath] Count equal to [Burst] Count on target (2 per 1 enemy; once per turn)

In a Clash, if this unit's Offense Level is higher than the target's, Clash Power +1

In a Clash, if this unit's Offense Level is higher than the target's, inflict +1 more [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count with this unit's Base Attack Skills (2 times per turn)
1081201.name: Rupture-breathing Resolve [破吸自桓]

1081202.desc:
Upon Retreat: apply 1 [AttackUp] next turn to allies in their Deployment order
- Number of affected allies = [StartXichun] Stack on self
- If the affected ally is a "Jia Family" unit, apply 2 [AttackUp] next turn instead
- Does not affect allies that either Return or Substitute next turn

On the turn this unit Substituted or Returned to the field, gain [WaitingXichun]; then, at Combat Start, as the very first Skill in the Skill order, use 'Crimson Strike - Launcher【始】' against a random target.
1081202.name: Launching Maneuver [始動]

1081221.desc:
If this unit is defeated in an Encounter, apply [CheerUpXichun] to the subsequently Substituting Identity (the fastest Backup Unit in the Deployment Order) next turn

In Chain Battles, if this unit is a Backup unit or has Retreated, activate the following:
- Combat Start: Among the Identities who 1) are at 50% HP or lower, and 2) used a Defense Skill, choose the Identity with the earliest Deployment order. At Turn End, that Identity recovers from Stagger due to damage and performs a [RetreatForCommon] (2 times per Encounter)
1081221.name: Lingering Resolve [餘桓]
